languages.text: {n}На каменном лице Соломона мелькает боль, когда он смотрит на своего пса.{/n} "Вы с самого начала использовали нас как инструмент против Вольного Торговца. Уловки и интриги, недостойные Арбитес".

{n}Pain flits across Solomorne's granite face as he looks at his dog.{/n} "You have used us as a tool against the Rogue Trader from the beginning. Such tricks and schemes are unworthy of the Arbites."
languages.original_text: {n}На каменном лице Соломона мелькает боль, когда он смотрит на своего пса.{/n} "Вы с самого начала использовали нас как инструмент против Вольного Торговца. Уловки и интриги, недостойные Арбитес".

{n}Pain flits across Solomorne's granite face as he looks at his dog.{/n} "You have used us as a tool against the Rogue Trader from the beginning. Such tricks and schemes are unworthy of the Arbites."

{n}Pain flits across Solomorne's granite face as he looks at his dog.{/n} "You have used us as a tool against the Rogue Trader from the beginning. Such tricks and schemes are unworthy of the Arbites."

languages.text: {n}Ein Anflug von Schmerz huscht über Solomornes regloses Gesicht, als er seinen Hund betrachtet.{/n} "Ihr habt uns von Anfang an als Werkzeug gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} benutzt. Derartige Tricks und Intrigen sind des Arbites nicht würdig."
languages.original_text: {n}Pain flits across Solomorne's granite face as he looks at his dog.{/n} "You have used us as a tool against the Rogue Trader from the beginning. Such tricks and schemes are unworthy of the Arbites."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Anflug von Schmerz huscht über Solomornes regloses Gesicht, als er seinen Hund betrachtet.{/n} "Ihr habt uns von Anfang an als Werkzeug gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} benutzt. Derartige Tricks und Intrigen sind des Arbites nicht würdig."

languages.text: {n}Un éclair de douleur traverse le visage de granite de Solomorne tandis qu'il regarde son chien.{/n} « Vous nous avez utilisés depuis le début comme des outils contre {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. De telles manigances sont indignes de l'Arbites. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pain flits across Solomorne's granite face as he looks at his dog.{/n} "You have used us as a tool against the Rogue Trader from the beginning. Such tricks and schemes are unworthy of the Arbites."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un éclair de douleur traverse le visage de granite de Solomorne tandis qu'il regarde son chien.{/n} « Vous nous avez utilisés depuis le début comme des outils contre {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. De telles manigances sont indignes de l'Arbites. »

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙看着他的狗，花岗岩般冷峻的脸上露出了痛苦的表情。{/n}“从一开始，你就把我们当成对付行商浪人的工具。这样的阴谋诡计，简直是令法务部蒙羞。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pain flits across Solomorne's granite face as he looks at his dog.{/n} "You have used us as a tool against the Rogue Trader from the beginning. Such tricks and schemes are unworthy of the Arbites."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙看着他的狗，花岗岩般冷峻的脸上露出了痛苦的表情。{/n}“从一开始，你就把我们当成对付行商浪人的工具。这样的阴谋诡计，简直是令法务部蒙羞。”

languages.text: {n}El dolor atraviesa el rostro implacable de Solomorne cuando mira a su perro.{/n} «Podrían habernos usado como herramienta contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente desde el principio. Estos trucos y maquinaciones no son propios del Arbites».
languages.original_text: {n}Pain flits across Solomorne's granite face as he looks at his dog.{/n} "You have used us as a tool against the Rogue Trader from the beginning. Such tricks and schemes are unworthy of the Arbites."

traits.locale_text: {n}El dolor atraviesa el rostro implacable de Solomorne cuando mira a su perro.{/n} «Podrían habernos usado como herramienta contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente desde el principio. Estos trucos y maquinaciones no son propios del Arbites».

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの岩のような顔に痛みが走り、彼は自分の犬を見つめた。{/n}「あなたは私たちを最初からローグトレーダーに対する道具として利用してきました。そのような策略や陰謀は高等裁定局にふさわしくありません」
languages.original_text: {n}Pain flits across Solomorne's granite face as he looks at his dog.{/n} "You have used us as a tool against the Rogue Trader from the beginning. Such tricks and schemes are unworthy of the Arbites."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの岩のような顔に痛みが走り、彼は自分の犬を見つめた。{/n}「あなたは私たちを最初からローグトレーダーに対する道具として利用してきました。そのような策略や陰謀は高等裁定局にふさわしくありません」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un köpeğine bakarken duyduğu acı, sert çehresine yansıyor.{/n} "Başından beri Hür Tacir'e karşı kullanılmışız demek... Bu kadar hile hurda, Arbites mensuplarına yakışmadı."
languages.original_text: {n}Pain flits across Solomorne's granite face as he looks at his dog.{/n} "You have used us as a tool against the Rogue Trader from the beginning. Such tricks and schemes are unworthy of the Arbites."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'un köpeğine bakarken duyduğu acı, sert çehresine yansıyor.{/n} "Başından beri Hür Tacir'e karşı kullanılmışız demek... Arbites mensuplarına yakışmadı bu kadar hile hurda."
